          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Antibiotics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Antibiotika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Antibiotiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Antibióticos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Antibiotici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιβιοτικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Antibióticos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three agar plates covered with one type of bacterium where one contains no antibiotic (left), and the other two are soaked in antibiotics A (middle) and B (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">agar plate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">antibiotics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Drugs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jelly</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">medicines</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei Nährbodenplatten, die
mit einem Typen Bakterium bedeckt werden, in dem man kein Antibiotikum
(nach links) enthält, und die anderen zwei werden in Antibiotika A 
(mittlere) und B getränkt (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre trois plats d'agar 
couverts d'un type de bactérie où on ne contient aucun antibiotique 
(à gauche), et les autres deux sont imbibés en antibiotiques A 
(moyen) et B (droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra três placas de ágar 
cobertas com o um tipo de bactéria onde uma não contem nenhum 
antibiótico (à esquerda), e os outros dois são embebidos nos 
antibióticos A (médio) e B (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra tre piastre di agar 
coperte di un tipo di batterio in cui uno non contiene antibiotico (a 
sinistra) e gli altri due sono impregnati in antibiotici A (centrale) 
e B (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση τρία πιάτα αγάρ που καλύπτονται 
εμφανίζει με έναν τύπο βακτηριδίου όπου ο ένας δεν περιέχει 
κανένα αντιβιοτικό (αριστερά), και άλλοι οι δύο είναι 
ενυδατωμένοι στα αντιβιοτικά Α (μέση) και β (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra tres placas de agar 
cubiertas con un tipo de bacteria donde una no contiene ningún 
antibiótico (a la izquierda), y los otros dos se remojan en los 
antibióticos A (media) y B (derecho).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nährbodenplatte</string>
          </keyword>
